Queen of Muses

Laura Mullen





Elsie the C
Is, you understand,
Just an opening—
An opportunity.

Both her names
End with eeeeeeee:
So if you even
Say hello
You’re squealing.

And everything
(My lawyers insist
I add this) in these
Poems is completely
Imaginary—even
The refugees.

11-11 © 2001-2018
